pricing_description: 508.dev is a co-op, so we have no overhead for shareholders or owners. That means your money goes further than is possible with traditional corporations.
pricing_1_description: Choosing 508.dev means you get the maximum value for every dollar you spend.
pricing_1_features: Engineers keep majority of the rate
Small, vetted talent pool ensures quality
pricing_2_description: High rates and high margins make it impossible for agencies to get you good value for your money.
pricing_2_features: Low cut of bill rate means no ownership
No access to the best engineers globally
pricing_facts_description: 508.dev's structure as a co-op means that all members are co-owners. This guarantees the best bang for our client's buck while allowing us to maintain higher engineering standards than any other organization.

pricing_facts.title: Co-ownership
pricing_facts.description: Because every member is a co-owner, product ownership is higher than in agencies. The co-op's portfolio and reputation is in the hands of our members.

pricing_facts.title: Fair Rates
pricing_facts.description: Our competitors will bill you 200$/hr and pay their engineer 30$/hr. What quality of work can you expect in that situation?

pricing_facts.title: Unbeatable Margin
pricing_facts.description: Agencies need high margin for their shareholders. With us, you're able to get as close as possible "to the metal" of an engineer's bill rate without onboarding them.

pricing_facts.title: High Quality
pricing_facts.description: We don't have a "talent pool," we have co-op members, all of whom have been rigorously vetted.

pricing_facts.title: Transparency
pricing_facts.description: The people estimating projects are the same people building them, allowing us to give highly accurate estimates.

pricing_facts.title: Offshore
pricing_facts.description: Our engineers across the world are typically available for more competitive rates than local.

pricing_facts.title: Organization
pricing_facts.description: Being a co-owner comes with huge responsibility, meaning membership self-selects for highly independent, self-managed individuals.

pricing_facts.title: The Best Team
pricing_facts.description: Nobody can beat us on our margin on rate, and so we have the best offshore engineers in the world. Plain and simple.
